import { useState } from 'react' const Books = (props) => { const [genre, setGenre] = useState('') if (!props.show) { return null } const books = [...props.books] const genres = [...new Set(books.flatMap((book) => book.genres))] const filteredBooks = genre ? books.filter((book) => book.genres.includes(genre)) : books return (

books

{filteredBooks.map((a) => ( ))}
author published
{a.title} {a.author.name} {a.published}
) } export default Books
